name: Spaceship Royale AI Version
description:
Controls are in the controls menu. 

If you want to play with your friends or multiplayer go here -----> https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/578584852

Lore: their names are Unit X-R and as you can see they are a variant of the Commando's but as you can see one of their hands is badly damaged that's why they can only shoot one bullet, we can say they are zombies coming to kill us. You must stop them before it's too late.
